help.title: help (command)
help.description: Displays list of commands or information about specific command. Parameters:

values.name: command
values.description: name of command. (Eg. connect, queue, skip, skip to)

connect.title: connect [voicechannel]
connect.description: Connects/migrates to another voice channel. Does not destroy the underlying audio resource. Parameters:

disconnect.title: disconnect
disconnect.description: Disconnect from voice channel and pause underlying audio resource

loop.title: loop [subcommand]
loop.description: Loops current playing song or through queue. Available subcommands:

fields.name: currsong
fields.value: loop the current playing song

fields.name: queue
fields.value: loop the queue with dequeuing operation disabled when /skip is used

fields.name: off
fields.value: turns off looping (enables default dequeuing operations)

nowplaying.title: nowplaying
nowplaying.description: Display title and url of song currently playing

play.title: play (query)
play.description: Resolves audio resource issue or enqueues song. Parameters:

fields.name: query
fields.value: Query can be composed of raw keywords (eg. title of song) or the url of a youtube or spotify video/playlist. If left blank, the play command attempts to commence playback.

playlist.title: playlist [subcommand]
playlist.description: Manage or enqueue content of personal playlists. Available subcommands:

fields.name: import
fields.value: import a playlist from youtube

fields.name: info
fields.value: display content of specific playlist

fields.name: additem
fields.value: add an item to personal playlist

fields.name: removeitem
fields.value: remove an item from personal playlist

fields.name: load
fields.value: enqueue content of playlist to queue

fields.name: view
fields.value: show all personal playlists

fields.name: create
fields.value: create a personal playlist

fields.name: rename
fields.value: rename a personal playlist

fields.name: delete
fields.value: delete a personal playlist

queue.title: queue (pagenumber)
queue.description: Displays content of queue including the positions of the content. 10 results per page. Parameters:

fields.name: pagenumber
fields.value: Positive integer representing the page of results to display. If left blank, queue by default shows the first number.

remove.title: remove [subcommand]
remove.description: Remove item(s) from the queue. Available subcommands:

fields.name: item
fields.value: remove a specific item from queue

fields.name: range
fields.value: remove a specific range of items from queue

remove item.title: remove item [position]
remove item.description: remove a specific item from the queue. Parameters:

fields.name: position
fields.value: position of song in the queue to remove..

remove range.title: remove range [start] [end]
remove range.description: removes a specified range of items from the queue. Parameters:

fields.name: start
fields.value: (INCLUSIVE) start queue position value

fields.name: end
fields.value: (INCLUSIVE) end queue position value.

shuffle.title: shuffle
shuffle.value: Randomises the queue using Fisher-Yates Shuffle algorithm

skip.title: skip [subcommand]
skip.value: Skips to the next song or a specified position in the queue. Available subcommands:

fields.name: to
fields.value: Skips to specified position in queue, dequeuing all items in front of the specified position

fields.name: next
fields.value: Skips to next song in queue

skip to.title: skip to [position]
skip to.description: Skips to specified position in queue and dequeues all items up to the specified position. Parameters:

fields.name: position
fields.description: position in queue to skip to. Use /queue to see state of queue and valid positions.

skip next.title: skip next
skip next.description: Skips to next song in queue. No parameters.

swap.title: swap [pos1] [pos2]
swap.value: Swaps two items in the queue. Parameters:

fields.name: pos1 (and pos2)
fields.value: Positive integer representing a position in the queue

volume.title: volume [vol]
volume.value: Sets the volume of the audio resource. Parameters:

fields.name: vol
fields.value: Number between 0 and 1

history.title: history [subcommand]
history.description: Displays history of songs played or enqueued. Available subcommands:

fields.name: play
fields.value: show history of songs played

fields.name: queue
fields.value: show history of songs enqueued

history play.title: history play (page) (personal)
history play.description: Displays history of songs played. 5 results per page. Parameters:

fields.name: page
fields.value: Page number. Must be a positive integer between 1 and the highest page number. Default value is 1.

fields.name: personal
fields.value: Boolean flag. If set to true, command displays history of songs played that were enqueued by the issuer of the command. Default value is zero.

history queue.title: history queue (page) (personal)
history queue.description: Displays history of songs enqueued. 5 results per page. Parameters:

fields.name: page
fields.value: Page number. Must be a positive integer between 1 and the highest page number. Default value is 1.

fields.name: personal
fields.value: Boolean flag. If set to true, command displays history of songs enqueued by the issuer of the command. Default value is false.
